name: CORE (MarioNieto)
description:
This is the first game I have done with the UNITY Software, I created it with the objective of learning.

It is a first person adventure, where the goal is to reach the core and activate it. It is a short game, but with which I have learned a lot.
It took me 7 days to create it, and I took care of the programming, 3D modeling, Level Design, Musical composition and Sound FX.

Contact: marionietoworld@gmail.com
